vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
μόρφ-ωσις, εως, ἡ,
shaping, bringing into shape, σχηματισμὸς καὶ μ. τῶν δένδρων [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__II form, semblance, [NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
embodiment, formulation; (outward) form, appearance
primarily a shaping, moulding; in NT external form, appearance, 2Tim. 3:5; a settled form, embodiment. prescribed system, Rom. 2:20*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 形式, 塑造, 體現  (羅 2:20; 提後 3:5)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 形式, 塑造, 体现 (罗 2:20; 提后 3:5)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: sự thành hình; mẫu mực; hình thức / hiện thân
